mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( USER_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DT, READ_COUNT) VALUES ( #{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0)
INSERT INTO NOTICE_FILE ( NOTICE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_URL ) VALUES ( #{noticeId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT n.NOTICE_ID, n.USER_SEQ, u.USER_NAME, n.TITLE, n.CONTENT, n.REG_DT, n.READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE n, USER u WHERE n.USER_SEQ = u.USER_SEQ ORDER BY n.NOTICE_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT n.NOTICE_ID, n.USER_SEQ, u.USER_NAME, n.TITLE, n.CONTENT, n.REG_DT, n.READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE n, USER u WHERE n.USER_SEQ = u.USER_SEQ AND n.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord} ,'%') ORDER BY n.NOTICE_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord} ,'%')
SELECT FILE_URL FROM NOTICE_FILE WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
SELECT n.NOTICE_ID, n.USER_SEQ, u.USER_NAME, n.TITLE, n.CONTENT, n.REG_DT, n.READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE n, USER u WHERE n.NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId} AND n.USER_SEQ = u.USER_SEQ
SELECT count(*) FROM NOTICE_USER_READ WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId} and USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_USER_READ ( NOTICE_ID, USER_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{noticeId}, #{userSeq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE set READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
